other_tests.findings: In fibroblasts from the proband, basal cGMP levels and CNP-stimulated cGMP production were markedly increased compared to controls.
Identified a heterozygous c.1444_1449delATGCTG deletion in exon 8 of NPR2, resulting in deletion of two amino acids Met482-Leu483 within the sub-membrane region of NPR-B.
